title: STAWSKI – 115
content:
Certainly an element of Phoebe Bridgers to this track from Pittsburgh’s STAWSKI, whilst bringing plenty of her own personality to the table.

Wistful and earnest, 115 is a real heart on sleeve moment, penned about losing someone and deciding to embrace the absence and pain rather than staying numb to the emotions, it’s a luxuriously honest three and a half minutes of writing. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
